item.description:
http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=230461480328502

Dear Supporter,

To celebrate the official opening of our New Hampshire campaign office, we are holding a kick off event, on Wednesday, August 17th, at 128 Hall St, Suite D in Concord.

We will begin serving food, including hamburgers, hot dogs, chips, cookies and soda at 6:00 PM, and at 7:00PM, Dr. Paul will deliver a speech. This will be an outdoor event on the green next to our office.

We hope you will join us, as we are excited to show you the NH HQ, which is spacious and will provide the facilities we need to run a winning campaign in New Hampshire.

Please RSVP to Marian Ward, our office manager, at marianw@ronpaul2012.com

Hope to see you there!

Jared Chicoine
NH State Director
item.name: Ron Paul visits Concord HQ
